name: fha-recovery-app
description: FHA Recovery Web Application - Full Stack

scripts.dev:backend: cd fha-recovery-backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.start:backend: cd fha-recovery-backend && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001
scripts.format: cd fha-recovery-app && npm run format && cd ../fha-recovery-backend && poetry run black .
scripts.lint: cd fha-recovery-app && npm run lint && cd ../fha-recovery-backend && poetry run flake8 .

author: FHA Recovery Team
